absorption.description: Indicates a chiller which uses absorption driven by hot water (as opposed to vapor compression).

ahu.description: Air Handler Unit which heats and/or cools air.

ahuRef.description: Associate an entity such as a vav with an ahu.

air.description: Point associated with the measurement or control of air. In regards to wetBulb points with the air tag are associated with dry bulb.

airCooled.description: Indicates chiller which uses air to cool the hot refrigerant.

area.description: Floor area of a site measured in ft² or m².

blowdown.description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the blowdown water expelled from a coolingTower or boiler to remove mineral build up.

boiler.description: Boiler equip used to generate hot water or steam for heating.

boilerPlant.description: Group of one or more boilers.

boilerPlantRef.description: Associate an entity such as an ahu or boiler with its boilerPlant.

bypass.description: If used with valve indicates a by-pass in a piping system.

centrifugal.description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses a continuous flow of fluid through an impeller.

chilled.description: Marker tag used with water for the chilled water system between chiller and ahu.

chilledBeamZone.description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to zones via chilled beam terminal units. These are terminal units with a cooling and/or heating coil but no damper nor fan.

chiller.description: Chillers remove heat from a liquid via a vapor compression or an absorption refrigeration cycle.

chillerPlant.description: Chiller plants model the entire system of equipment used to generate chilled water.

chillerPlantRef.description: Associate a record such as an ahu with its chillerPlant.

circuit.description: An equip which models an electric circuit housed in an elecPanel. A circuit contains the points associated with sensors fuses or breakers.

closedLoop.description: Indicates coolingTower which keeps the working fluid separate from the fluid used for heat transfer into the atmosphere.

cmd.description: Classifies a point as an output AO/BO command or actuator.

co2.description: Carbon dioxide level point measured in ppm.

coldDeck.description: Associated with the cold air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU.

condensate.description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the condensate water in a coolingTower or boiler.

condenser.description: When combined with the water tag this indicates points in a condenser water system between a chiller and coolingTower.

connection.description: Marker tag for a logical network connection between two devices using a specific communications protocol.

constantVolume.description: Marks an ahu as delivering a constant volume of air flow. Typically this means that AHU runs with a single speed fan.

cool.description: Cooling coil as bool or numeric point used with ahu equip. If multiple stages are used then also specify the stage tag. If the cooling coil is controlled by a valve then this point is mesaured from 0% to 100% otherwise it should be a boolean point.

cooling.description: Associated with the cooling mode of an HVAC system.

coolingCapacity.description: Measurement of a chiller ability to remove heat measured in tonref BTU/h or kW.

coolingTower.description: Cooling towers are used to transfer process waste heat to the atmosphere.

cur.description: Marker tag which indicates the point has capability for subscription to its real-time current value.

curErr.description: Error message associated when curStatus indicates an error condition.

curStatus.description: Current status of a point curVal as one of the predefined strings:

curVal.description: Current value of a point or other value record

current.description: Electrical current point measured in A for elec meter.

damper.description: Damper position measured from 0% (fully closed) to 100% (fully open).

delta.description: Indicates a differential of air water or steam between the entering and leaving sensors.

device.description: Models a physical device on a communication network. Devices include servers area controllers field controllers and networking gear.

device1Ref.description: Models the first end point device of a connection

device2Ref.description: Models the second end point device of a connection

directZone.description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air directly to a zone.

dis.description: Short display name for an entity.

discharge.description: Associated with the discharge air an ahu or vav.

domestic.description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of tap water used for drinking washing cooking and flushing of toliets.

dualDuct.description: Indicates an ahu which discharges into two ducts which are some combinatin of hotDeck coldDeck or neutralDeck.

effective.description: Used to indicate the effective setpoint which takes into account if a unit is operating in cooling or heating mode.

efficiency.description: Efficiency point of a chiller measured in COP or kW/ton.

elec.description: Used on point or equip entities relating to electricity. When paried with meter indicates a electric meter.

elecMeterLoad.description: Equip or point which consumes energy as electrial load. Value should reference the meter it is associated with.

elecMeterRef.description: Associates a piece of equipment with an elec meter.

elecPanel.description: An equip which models the physical housing for electric circuits.

elecPanelOf.description: Associates a circuit with its elecPanel.

enable.description: Secondary on/off point of an equip especially used with a vfd. Enable is used with Bool points where true indicates on and false indicates off. Equip with an enable should always also define a run point which indicates the primary on/off state of the equipment.

energy.description: Applied to point entities which measure energy consumption:

entering.description: Indicates water or steam entering a piece of equipment like a boiler or chiller. Used with vav for air flow into the unit from the AHU.

enum.description: Comma separated list of text names to use for Bool or Str point. It is strongly recommended that text names do not include special characters. If annotating a Bool point then the names are ordered falsetrue. Examples:

equipRef.description: Association with an equip entity. When used on a point this indicates a sensor/cmd/setpoint associated with the equipment. When used on an equip it indicates nesting/containment.

evaporator.description: Indicates points on the evaporator mechanism used to convert a refrigerant from its liquid to gageous state. It is often paired with the refrig marker tag.

exhaust.description: Associated with the exhaust air an ahu.

faceBypass.description: A point of an ahu indicating air flow is by-passing the heating/cooling elements. If a boolean point then true indicates the unit is in by-pass mode and false indicates by-pass is disabled. If the point is an analog point then 100% indicates full by-pass mode and 0% that by-pass is completely disabled.

fan.description: Fan point or equip associated with an ahu vav or coolingTower.

filter.description: Differential pressure across the filter of an ahu. If a boolean point then true indicates successful airflow and false indicates a clogged filter. If a numeric then the pressure differential should be measured in inH₂O or kPa

flow.description: Marker tag on a point which measures rate of volume currently flowing through a flow meter duct or pipe .

freezeStat.description: A boolean point of an ahu indicating a freezing condition which might require a control sequence to protect the equipment. If true then a freeze condition is deteted or false if not.

freq.description: Electrical A/C frequency point measured in Hz for elec meter or a vfd.

gas.description: Used on point or equip entities relating to natural gas. When paried with meter indicates a gas meter.

gasMeterLoad.description: Equip or point which consumes fuel gas as load. Value should reference the meter it is associated with.

geoAddr.description: Geographic street address. This is a free form string which may be used to geocode specific geolocation tags.
geoAddr.seeAlso: geoCity; geoCountry; geoCoord; geoPostalCode; geoState; geoStreet

geoCountry.description: Geographic country as ISO 3166-1 two letter code. Codes for common countries:

geoPostalCode.description: Geographic postal code; for US this is a five digit zip code.

geoState.description: State or province name; for US this is two letter state code. This tag may also be used to model an adminstrative area betwen the geoCity and geoCountry level.

heat.description: Heating coil as bool or float point on an ahu or vav. If multiple stages are used then also specify the stage tag. If the heating coil is controlled by a valve then this point is mesaured from 0% to 100% otherwise it should be a boolean point.

heatExchanger.description: Heat exchangers are used to transfer heat from one medium to another.

heatWheel.description: Bool point which models the on or off state of an ahu heat wheel.

heating.description: Associated with the heating mode of an HVAC system.

his.description: Indicates that a point is historized with a history log of timestamp/value pairs.

hisErr.description: Error message associated when hisStatus indicates an error condition.

hisInterpolate.description: Indicates how interpolation of a historized point should be handled. Valid values are cov and linear:

hisStatus.description: Current status of a point history sync as one of the predefined strings:

hisTotalized.description: Indicates values which are a continuous stream of totalization and should be read by computing the delta.

hot.description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of hot water.

hotDeck.description: Associated with the hot air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU.

humidifier.description: Boolean or numeric point of an ahu used to indicate if if the humidifier is on or off.

hvac.description: Associated with HVAC (Heating Ventilating Air Conditioning)
hvac.label.zh: H V A C  //暖通空调

isolation.description: Indicates a valve used to isolate a piece of equipment from a piping system.

kind.description: Defines a tag value type using a predefined string constant. When used on a point the kind is expected to be Bool Number or Str.

leaving.description: Indicates water or steam exiting a piece of equipment like a boiler or chiller.

lightLevel.description: Light level sensor point under lightsGroup measured in lux or lumen.

lighting.description: Indicates association with the lighting system.

lights.description: Lighting on/off status as a boolean or if dimmable a numeric between 0% and 100%.

lightsGroup.description: Equip level of the lighting system which is a group of one or more lights points.

load.description: Models a point on a chiller used to command or measure the chillers load as a percentage from 0% to 100%. When paired with cmd this models the chillers load limit. When paired with sensor this models the chillers current load factor.

makeup.description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the makeup water in a coolingTower or boiler used to replace water lost through leaks evaporation or blowdown.

maxVal.description: Applied to point to define the maximum value to read from a sensor or to write from a command/setpoint. This values unit must match the points unit tag.

meter.description: Equip which meters usage of elec energy thermal energy gas water or steam.

minVal.description: Applied to point to define the minumum value to read from a sensor or to write from a command/setpoint. This values unit must match the points unit tag.

mixed.description: Associated with the mixed air of an ahu.

multiZone.description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to its zones via a ductwork manifold which splits the air into a duct per zone.

network.description: Network models a communication network between multiple devices.

networkRef.description: Models the network of a connection

neutralDeck.description: Associated with the neutral air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU. The neutral deck is the duct where air is passed thru neither the heating nor cooling coil.

occupancyIndicator.description: Occupancy sensor under lightsGroup. Point must be Bool where true indicates occupied and false indicates unoccupied

occupied.description: Marker tag used with a boolean point to indicate whether a site or zone is occupied (true) or unoccupied (false).

openLoop.description: Indicates coolingTower which uses the working fluid itself for evaporation into the atmosphere.

outside.description: Associated with outside air often used to model ahu points.

perimeterHeat.description: Auxiliary heating points associated with a vav.

pf.description: Power factor of an elec meter as a unitless number between 0.0 and 1.0 which represents the ratio of real power over apparent power.
pf.label.fr: Power Factor (Facteur De Puissance / Facteur Puissance)

phase.description: Association of one or more phases in a three-phase electrical system. This string must be one of the following constant values:

point.description: Data point such as a sensor or actuator.

power.description: Applied to point entities which measure energy consumed per unit time. For elec meter this is the electrical demand.

pressure.description: Static air pressure measured in inH₂O or kPa.

primaryFunction.description: Enumerated string applied to a site record to indicate the buildings primary function. The list of primary functions is derived from the US Energy Star program:

primaryLoop.description: Indicates equipment and points which are associated with a chiller or boiler plants primary loop - the pipework within the central plant.

protocol.description: String enumeration for a connection communication protocol. Standardized values:

pump.description: Marker tag for an equip which models a pump.

reciprocal.description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses pistons driven by a crankshaft.

refrig.description: Indicates points associated with the measurment or control of the refrigerant substance in a cooling system like a chiller.

return.description: Associated with the return air an ahu.

rooftop.description: Used with ahu to mark an AHU as a packaged rooftop unit (RTU).

run.description: Primary on/off point of an equip especially used with a vfd. Run is used with Bool points where true indicates on and false indicates off. When paired with cmd this is the commanded state of the equipment. When paired with sensor this is the actual status of the equip. If the equipment also defines an enable point then both must be commanded on in order to run the equipment.

screw.description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses a rotary mechanism.

secondaryLoop.description: Indicates equipment and points which are associated with a chiller or boiler plants secondary loop - the pipework from the central plant to the building.

sensor.description: Classifies a point as an input AI/BI or sensor.

site.description: Building or other type of facility with unique street address.

siteMeter.description: Applied to a meter which exclusively meters a single site identified by siteRef. As a general rule there must be a siteMeter for each unique site to perform site benchmarking. This marker may also be used on meter points such as power as a convenience.

sitePanel.description: Marker tag for a elecPanel to indicate its the main site-level panel.

sp.description: Classifies a point as a setpoint soft point or process control variable.

speed.description: Speed point of a vfd measured in % where 0% is off and 100% is the fastest speed.

stage.description: Indicates the stage of an AHU cooling or heating element. The first stage should have a value of 1 second of 2 etc.

steam.description: Point associated with the measurement or control of steam. This tag is often paired with entering versus leaving versus delta. It may also be paired with meter to indicate a steam meter.

steamMeterLoad.description: Equip or point which consumes steam as load. Value should reference the meter it is associated with.

subPanelOf.description: Ref tag to indicate that an elecPanel is positioned underneath another panel in the electric distribution system.

submeterOf.description: This tag is applied to submeters and references the parent meter.

sunrise.description: Boolean point associated with a weather station for historizing sunrise and sunset times. A transition to true indicates sunrise and false transition is sunset.

tripleDuct.description: Indicates an ahu which discharges into three ducts which are the hotDeck coldDeck and neutralDeck.

tz.description: Timezone identifier string which is a city name from the zoneinfo database.

unit.description: Unit of measurement identifier from unit database.

valve.description: Marker tag on point which indicates a valve used to regulate or control the flow or pressure of a fluid. It is used with cmd to indicate the valve command: true/false (open/close) or 0% to 100%. It may also be used with sensor to indicate a feedback sensor such as a voltage giving exact position between 0% and 100%.

variableVolume.description: Marks an ahu as delivering a variable volume of air flow. Most variable volume systems are powered by a VFD fan. However other techniques such as inlet vanes may be used in older systems.

vav.description: Variable Volume Volume supply duct equip.
vav.label.fr: BoîTe Volume Variable ( V A V

vavZone.description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to zones via vav terminal units.

vfd.description: Marker for a motor equip with variable frequency drive. Commonly used in combination with fan and pump.

volt.description: Electrical voltage point measured in V for elec meter.

volume.description: Marker tag on a point which measures total volume which has flowed through a meter duct or pipe. Volume units include gal m³ and ft³.

water.description: Point associated with the measurement or control of water. This tag is often paired:

waterCooled.description: Indicates chiller which uses water to cool the hot refrigerant.

waterMeterLoad.description: Equip or point which consumes water as load. Value should reference the meter it is associated with.

weather.description: Marker tag for a weather station entity.

weatherCond.description: Conditions point of weather station as a enumeration:

weatherPoint.description: Point sensor value associated with a weather station.

weatherRef.description: Associates an entity with a weather station.

wetBulb.description: Associates a point with the wet-bulb temperature. This is the temperature air would have if cooled to saturation by the evaporation of water into it. Dry bulb temperatures are indicated by use of the air tag.

writable.description: Annotates a point as a writable output with 16-level priority array.

writeErr.description: Error message associated when writeStatus indicates an error condition.

writeLevel.description: Current priority level for writeVal as number between 1 and 17. The value 17 indicates the relinquish default value.

writeStatus.description: Current status of a writable point output:

writeVal.description: Current desired value to write to output.

yearBuilt.description: Tag on site which is four digit year that a building was first built.

zone.description: Associated with a conditioned zone of a building.
